name: Maggi
passiveDesc: When Maggi's HP drops below 10% of her Max HP or nearby team members' HP drops below 5% of their Max HP, triggers City of Toys. City of Toys: If Maggi triggers City of Toys, she gains a Tide Star-Shield equals to 10% her Max HP and heals herself by 40% of her Magic PWR. If other team members trigger City of Toys, Maggi grants them a Tide Toy-Shield equals to 40% of her Magic PWR and heals them by 120% of her Magic PWR.
rTalentDesc: Maggi's Normal and Charged Attacks accumulate 2 Echo Memories and 5 Energy. Dealing Disorder DMG accumulates 1 Echo Memory and 10 Energy.
normalAttackDesc: Maggi launches her Star Toy to the target opponent dealing 14 (+34% Magic PWR) as Magic DMG.
chargedAttackDesc: Maggi uses her Toy Gun to blow a bubble towards the opponent dealing 22 (+44% Magic PWR) as AoE Tide DMG.
normalSkillDesc:
[2EM] Maggi grants a Tide Shield equals to 113 (+46.124% Magic PWR) to the selected team member.
[4EM] Maggi grants a Tide Toy-Shield equals to 164 (+78.81% Magic PWR) to the selected team member. While the Toy-Shield is active, if an opponent deals DMG to the character with the Toy-Shield, Maggi will uses her Toy Gun to launch a Tide Beam towards the same opponent deaeling 106 + (38.98% Magic PWR) as Follow-Up Tide DMG.
[6EM] Maggi grants a Tide Toy-Shield equals to 203 (+101.922% Magic PWR) to the selected team member and grants herself a Tide Star-Shield equals to 113 (+114.93% Magic PWR). While the Toy-Shield is active, if an opponent deals DMG to the character with the Toy-Shield, Maggi will uses her Toy Gun to launch a Tide Beam towards the same opponent deaeling 114 + (46.71% Magic PWR) as Follow-Up Tide DMG. While the Star-Shield is active, Maggi's Magic PWR is increased by 36%.
riftedSkillDesc: Maggi blesses all team members with All-Waters Blessing, increasing their Magic PWR by 56% her Magic PWR for 4 Cycles. Additionally, if team members has a Toy-Shield, converts the Toy-Shield into Blessed-Toy-Shield. While the Blessed-Toy-Shield is active, heals the character under the Blessed-Toy-Shield by 98 (+136.26% Magic PWR). After 4 Cycles, if the Blessed-Toy-Shield is still active, it will be converted back to Toy-Shield.
fragment1Desc: While casting "All-Waters Submerged", if team members has a Toy-Shield, increases the Shield Strength by 36%.
fragment2Desc: While the Toy-Shield is active, increases their Tide RES by 20%. Additionally, if Maggi's Tide Beam hits an opponent, decreases the opponent's Reaction RES by 12%, max 3 stacks.
fragment3Name: F3 - "I'll carry you through the darkness!"
fragment3Desc: "Under My Protection" level is increased by 3.
fragment4Desc: Characters under Toy-Shield have their CRIT Rate increased by 16% and CRIT DMG increased by 40%.
fragment6Desc: Maggi gains 0.015% Follow-Up Attack DMG Bonus for every 1 Magic PWR she has. Additionally, Maggi's Tide Beam triggered by an opponent attacking the team member with the Blessed-Toy-Shield, will launches 3 Piercing Tide Beam at the opponent's location, each dealing 224% Magic PWR as Follow-Up Tide DMG.
